name: Grimoire: Simulation Zero
description:
The Grimoire holds the secrets of the Universe, but only a Wizard’s eyes may perceive its Words. For this, the world has known many eras of war.

It is the year 20XX. 

Wizards have been outlawed. A crime punishable by death.

For the betterment of Mankind, Elfkind, and the Lesser Beings, Cosmic-Corp created a new brand of automaton police to hunt Wizards. These hunters, called Hawks, are designed to think like wizards in order to find them. However, this has raised many concerns about the possibility of a Hawk thinking too much like a true Wizard. Therefore Cosmic-Corp has agreed to run every Hawk through a series of simulations designed to detect complex feelings.

How does this make you feel?
